items.content_html: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!
items.title: nodebysam/TestLab.js: TestLab.js: A lightweight and flexible unit testing framework for Node.js, designed to make writing and running tests simple and intuitive. With a focus on performance and developer-friendly APIs, TestLab.js helps you build robust, bug-free applications effortlessly. Perfect for any project, big or small!

items.content_html: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, migrate, and experiment with Pine-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
items.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, migrate, and experiment with Pine-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

items.content_html: A lightweight local dev server for quickly mocking API endpoints and testing HTTP requests.
items.title: geoffmiller/localroutes: A lightweight local dev server for quickly mocking API endpoints and testing HTTP requests.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight web server designed for managing self-made services and scripts on your local Raspberry Pi network
items.title: Xv3nm/pihub: A lightweight web server designed for managing self-made services and scripts on your local Raspberry Pi network

items.content_html: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
items.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight page object implementation with a focus on simplicity and extensibility
items.title: bendemboski/fractal-page-object: A lightweight page object implementation with a focus on simplicity and extensibility

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight and type-safe vanilla JS state management library
items.title: runicjs/runic: A lightweight and type-safe vanilla JS state management library

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight, dependency-less A/B audio player
items.title: trozzelle/gorgon-player: A lightweight, dependency-less A/B audio player

items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js private proxy registry
items.title: verdaccio/verdaccio: A lightweight Node.js private proxy registry

items.content_html: Lightweight web-based application to visualize 3D point cloud data and integrate basic GIS viewing functionality.
items.title: osamu-ad/Voyis-Test-3D: Lightweight web-based application to visualize 3D point cloud data and integrate basic GIS viewing functionality.

items.content_html: A lightweight, efficient syntax highlighting library with zero runtime dependencies
items.title: The-Best-Codes/best-highlight: A lightweight, efficient syntax highlighting library with zero runtime dependencies

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
items.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
